translation.en: Justice, like lightning Should ever appear
translation.ja: 〝正義は稲妻のごとし〞

translation.en: To some men hope And to other men fear.
translation.ja: 〝希望にも 恐怖にもなる〞

translation.en: My father taught me that poem when I was just a little girl.
translation.ja: 幼い頃 父から聞いた詩だ

translation.en: My son wasn't in no gang. He had a job with the city and a little boy.
translation.ja: 息子はギャングじゃなく 役所勤めで子供もいた

translation.en: Our children are dying in these streets and no one cares.
translation.ja: 人が殺されても 誰も気にせず

translation.en: No one is in control. Not even the police.
translation.ja: 警察も 手出しできない 〝１００(ハンドレッド)がまたも 罪のない命を奪う〞 〝１００(ハンドレッド)がまたも 罪のない命を奪う〞

translation.en: This city has really lost its damn mind.
translation.ja: 〝１００(ハンドレッド)がまたも 罪のない命を奪う〞 この街はイカれてる 〝１００(ハンドレッド)がまたも 罪のない命を奪う〞

translation.en: This incident marks 125 shootings in Freeland in just one weekend,
translation.ja: フリーランド市では 今週末に１２５もの銃撃

translation.en: proof The One Hundred keeps growing even stronger in power.
translation.ja: １００が勢力を 増している証拠です

translation.en: Freeland activists took to the streets to protest the notorious gang,
translation.ja: 活動家が 抗議デモを行うも

translation.en: but it turned violent when One Hundred gang members tried to break up the march.  They shootin'!
translation.ja: １００の構成員が妨害し 暴動に発展しました

translation.en: We understand the community is frustrated with the violence in our city.
translation.ja: 皆さんのいらだちは 理解しています

translation.en: Freeland PD is frustrated, too. But I want to be clear,
translation.ja: 警察も同じで はっきり言いたい

translation.en: we will not tolerate any rioting, looting, or violence. Excuse me.
translation.ja: 我々はいかなる暴動も 略奪も許さないと

translation.en: But what about... One more question for you, Inspector--
translation.ja: では聞きますが…

translation.en: Many residents say they have lost faith in the Freeland PD and Inspector Henderson, a 23- year veteran
translation.ja: 住民の信頼を失った警察の ヘンダーソン警視は勤続23年

translation.en: who came up through the ranks fighting Black Lightning,
translation.ja: 宿敵の ブラックライトニングは

translation.en: who mysteriously disappeared nine years ago.
translation.ja: ９年前に姿を消しています

translation.en: One day, I wish these idiots would give us credit for all the lives we've saved in Freeland.
translation.ja: いつか こいつらに 警察の努力を認めさせたい

translation.en: I didn't fully understand the poem
translation.ja: 〝今どこ？！〞 〝今どこ？！〞 詩の真意は 家族と自分の 正体を知るまで不明だった 詩の真意は 家族と自分の 正体を知るまで不明だった 詩の真意は 家族と自分の 正体を知るまで不明だった 〝ハリエット気取りの 姉が逮捕された〞

translation.en: until I grew to know the truth about my family and myself.
translation.ja: 詩の真意は 家族と自分の 正体を知るまで不明だった 〝ハリエット気取りの 姉が逮捕された〞

translation.en: The signs were always there, but this is how the journey began.
translation.ja: 兆しはあったけど… 物語はここからだ 〝自警主義で指名手配〞

translation.en: Dad?
translation.ja: パパ

translation.en: That's my dress.
translation.ja: 私の服

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.ja: だよね

translation.en: So is this one. Now, hurry up and put it on
translation.ja: これもそう パパが取り乱す前に 着替えて

translation.en: before Dad gives birth to a small farm animal.
translation.ja: パパが取り乱す前に 着替えて

translation.en: Oh, so you looked at your schedule for tonight...
translation.ja: 今夜の予定は 選択肢があった 今夜の予定は 選択肢があった 〝今 向かってる〞

translation.en: and you had a choice.
translation.ja: 今夜の予定は 選択肢があった

translation.en: Protest The One Hundred, or attend Garfield High's fundraiser,
translation.ja: 100への抗議と ガーフィールド高の資金集め

translation.en: and you chose the path that led you to getting arrested.
translation.ja: まさか逮捕を選ぶとは

translation.en: It wasn't a choice, Dad.
translation.ja: 選んでない

translation.en: No, it was a choice, Anissa. Everything is a choice.
translation.ja: 違うぞ アニッサ すべては選択だ

translation.en: It was a peaceful protest.
translation.ja: 平和的デモよ

translation.en: Oh, yeah, burning police cars? Breaking windows?
translation.ja: パトカーを燃やし 窓を壊して？

translation.en: You know, that's actually the very definition of peaceful.
translation.ja: まさに“平和的”だな

translation.en: Well, I guess it depends on what your definition of peace is. Because the people in Freeland, they haven't had peace in generations.
translation.ja: “平和”の定義によるわ もう何十年も平和がないから

translation.en: Returning violence for violence multiplies violence,
translation.ja: “暴力に暴力で応じれば 暴力は倍増し”

translation.en: adding deeper darkness to a night already devoid of stars.
translation.ja: “星のない夜を さらに暗くするだけだ”

translation.en: Dr. King.
translation.ja: キング牧師ね

translation.en: And I'm sick and tired of being sick and tired.
translation.ja: “うんざりするのは もううんざり”

translation.en: - Fannie Lou Hamer. - Yep. - But that is not the point I'm making. -
translation.ja: ファニー･ルー･ヘイマー だが要点は別だ

translation.en: This night just keeps getting better and better.
translation.ja: ますます いい夜になる

translation.en: To be advised, the suspect is armed.
translation.ja: 被疑者は武装を…

translation.en: Dad, what's going on?
translation.ja: 何なの？

translation.en: - Copy that, Dispatch... - Just be calm.
translation.ja: 落ち着け

translation.en: - Ugh! - Let me handle this.
translation.ja: 任せろ

translation.en: Yeah, this doesn't feel so good, does it?
translation.ja: 気分悪いでしょ

translation.en: Jennifer.
translation.ja: ジェニファー

translation.en: Step out of the car.
translation.ja: 車から出て

translation.en: Look, Officer, my name is Jefferson Pierce--
translation.ja: ジェファーソン･ ピアースです

translation.en: Get out, please.
translation.ja: 降りなさい

translation.en: Okay, okay, look, this is getting out of hand. Now, this is the third time this month!
translation.ja: やりすぎじゃないか 今月３回目だぞ

translation.en: - Hey! - What are you doing?
translation.ja: 何するの？

translation.en: Get your hands off my dad!
translation.ja: パパを離して！

translation.en: - Let me see your hands! Now! - Stop!
translation.ja: 両手を見せろ！

translation.en: Don't shoot, all right? Everybody, just calm down!
translation.ja: 撃つな みんな落ち着いて

translation.en: Ma'am, put 'em up on the dashboard.
translation.ja: ダッシュボードに

translation.en: Anissa, put your hands on the dashboard!
translation.ja: アニッサ ダッシュボードに手を

translation.en: Dad, I have the right to videotape if I want to!
translation.ja: ビデオに撮る権利が

translation.en: Damn it, Anissa, just do it now!
translation.ja: いいから従え！

translation.en: Is this the guy?
translation.ja: 犯人ですか？

translation.en: You're not gonna tell me what this is all about?
translation.ja: 事情の説明もなしか？

translation.en: You have a good night, sir.
translation.ja: いい夜を

translation.en: I asked you a question.
translation.ja: 聞いてるんだ

translation.en: Her liquor store just got robbed.
translation.ja: 彼女の店に強盗が

translation.en: And I'm sure the description is what,
translation.ja: それで犯人の特徴は

translation.en: a black man dressed in a suit and tie?
translation.ja: スーツ姿に ネクタイをした黒人だと？

translation.en: Getaway car, a mid- sized Volvo wagon?
translation.ja: 逃走車は 中型のボルボのワゴン？

translation.en: You have a good night, sir.
translation.ja: では いい夜を

translation.en: This was the night, in the rain,
translation.ja: その夜 雨の中 雷と稲妻に目撃されながら

translation.en: with thunder and lightning as a witness, that Black Lightning was born again.
translation.ja: その夜 雨の中 雷と稲妻に目撃されながら ブラックライトニングは 再生した

translation.en: We all know that this city is in a crisis.
translation.ja: 街は危機に 瀕しています

translation.en: But under the leadership of Principal Jefferson Pierce,
translation.ja: しかし ピアース校長率いる―

translation.en: Garfield High is an oasis of hope.
translation.ja: ガーフィールド高は 希望の泉です

translation.en: This Olympic gold medal- winner came back
translation.ja: 金メダリストである彼は

translation.en: to his old neighborhood of Freeland to turn it around.
translation.ja: 故郷のフリーランドを 再生すべく着任

translation.en: And with graduation rates now in the 90s,
translation.ja: 卒業率は今や90％台に

translation.en: Jefferson does it all with the help of an outstanding faculty and his family.
translation.ja: 立派な教員と家族の 協力を得て― 成し遂げました

translation.en: His oldest daughter, Anissa, is a medical school student,
translation.ja: 長女のアニッサは 医学部に通いながら

translation.en: and teaches three days a week at the school as a health educator.
translation.ja: 週３回 本校で 保健を教えています

translation.en: His younger daughter, Jennifer,
translation.ja: 次女ジェニファーは

translation.en: is a standout scholar- athlete just like her father.
translation.ja: 父上同様 優秀なアスリートです

translation.en: - Girl, I was about to leave your ass. - Okay.
translation.ja: 先に行こうかと

translation.en: No. Ain't nobody got time to be waiting on the Queen Of Garfield High.
translation.ja: でも本校の女王を 置いてけない

translation.en: Kiesha, stop calling me that.
translation.ja: キーシャ 〝女王〞はやめて

translation.en: What? Girl, embrace it. It's true.
translation.ja: だって事実でしょ

translation.en: Yeah, but when people say it, they're just low- key hating on me
translation.ja: 何か遠まわしに 嫌われてるみたい

translation.en: for something I can't control. Like, my dad's the principal, I get it.
translation.ja: 何か遠まわしに 嫌われてるみたい 確かにパパは校長よ

translation.en: Girl, here you are. Where do y'all think y'all going?
translation.ja: ここにいたのね どこ行くの？

translation.en: Okay, okay. Damn, we're busted. Um...
translation.ja: 分かった　白状するね

translation.en: Listen, Khalil and a few of his friends were having a small house party, and Kiesha and I were gonna go.
translation.ja: カリルの家でパーティー キーシャと行くの

translation.en: So why are your fast asses in the bathroom, half naked?
translation.ja: 何でトイレで半分裸に？

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: Listen, I promise to be home before Dad gets home.
translation.ja: パパより早く帰るわ

translation.en: Come on, Harriet, help a sister get some freedom.
translation.ja: ハリエット　自由を

translation.en: Mmm- mmm. You know what it's like to live in that house.
translation.ja: ウチは厳しすぎる

translation.en: Please?
translation.ja: お願い

translation.en: Listen, Jennifer, this fundraiser is over at ten o'clock.
translation.ja: 聞いて このイベントは10時まで

translation.en: You better have your behind in the house no later than 10:15. - I'm not playing. - Yep.
translation.ja: 10時15分に家にいないと マズいことになるよ

translation.en: No, seriously.
translation.ja: 真剣に

translation.en: - 10:15. - Don't play with me.
translation.ja: 10時15分 本気で

translation.en: I'm not playing, I promise. I'll be at home in the bed.
translation.ja: 約束する ベッドで寝てるわ

translation.en: Love you.
translation.ja: 大好きよ

translation.en: And stop calling me Harriet Tubman.
translation.ja: ハリエットはやめて

translation.en: Oh, sorry...
translation.ja: ごめんね

translation.en: Okay, come on, come on, hurry up.
translation.ja: さあ 急いで

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, join me
translation.ja: 皆さん 拍手で迎えましょう

translation.en: and welcome to the stage, Principal Jefferson Pierce.
translation.ja: 拍手で迎えましょう ジェファーソン･ ピアース校長です

translation.en: Thank you, Senator Turner.
translation.ja: どうも　ターナー議員

translation.en: Where is the future?
translation.ja: 未来は？

translation.en: Right here.
translation.ja: ここにある

translation.en: And whose life is this?
translation.ja: 誰の人生？

translation.en: Mine!
translation.ja: 私の

translation.en: And what are you gonna do with it?
translation.ja: どうする？

translation.en: Live it by any means necessary.
translation.ja: 何があっても生きる

translation.en: You wanna go over there? Come on.
translation.ja: 向こうへ行く？

translation.en: - What do you say? - Are you serious?
translation.ja: どう？ 真剣なの？

translation.en: Listen, don't think just 'cause I'm a little stoned
translation.ja: ちょっと ハイになってるけど

translation.en: that means you're gonna get some. Because I'm not having sex in a club bathroom
translation.ja: サセないわ クラブのトイレは嫌だし

translation.en: with somebody I just met. Or ever.
translation.ja: 会ったばかりよ

translation.en: I was just playing.
translation.ja: 冗談さ

translation.en: No, you weren't. Because if I'd said yes, you would have been all over this.
translation.ja: ウソね イエスならグイグイきてた

translation.en: Okay, all right, I'll give you that.
translation.ja: 分かった　認めるよ

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.ja: 失礼

translation.en: You got a state senator introducing you?
translation.ja: 州の議員が紹介を？

translation.en: Don't let all this high- class ass- kissing go to your head.
translation.ja: おだてられて増長するなよ

translation.en: Henderson, uh, my students would define your comments as hatin'.
translation.ja: ヘンダーソン 生徒流に言えば “ディスってる”

translation.en: - - Thank you for your support.
translation.ja: 支援をどうも

translation.en: And more importantly, for pulling the strings to get Anissa released.
translation.ja: アニッサの釈放では 世話になった

translation.en: Of course. It's getting crazy out there, Jefferson.
translation.ja: いいんだ 街はイカれてる

translation.en: The rules of the streets don't apply anymore.
translation.ja: もはや無法地帯

translation.en: You protest the police, we'll tear gas you, arrest you, maybe even put a knot on your head.
translation.ja: 警察相手なら 催涙ガスか 逮捕か 頭にこぶ程度だが

translation.en: But protest The One Hundred and they will kill you.
translation.ja: 100に逆らえば殺される

translation.en: - - You tell Anissa she's needed more in emergency rooms than in those streets.
translation.ja: アニッサには 救命に専念させとけ

translation.en: Got to get back to work. And I'll check on those guys who pulled you over.
translation.ja: 行くよ お前を止めた連中は調べとく

translation.en: - I don't think they're mine. - Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがたい

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: Nice monkey suit.
translation.ja: 正装が似合う

translation.en: You should start a church, Jefferson. At least you would make more money.
translation.ja: 教会を始めたら もうかるぞ

translation.en: - - Enjoying yourself, Mr. Pierce?
translation.ja: 校長　お楽しみで？

translation.en: I will if we hit our goal tonight.
translation.ja: 目標額が集まれば

translation.en: - Well, turn on the charm. -
translation.ja: では 愛想よく

translation.en: - - I have someone you should meet.
translation.ja: 紹介したい方が

translation.en: Ms. Lady Eve from Black Bird Funeral Parlor.
translation.ja: ブラックバード葬儀社の レディ･イヴ

translation.en: Deep, deep pockets.
translation.ja: かなりの金持ちで

translation.en: - Yeah, I met her once or twice. - Oh! Okay, I will be over. Uh, just give me a minute.
translation.ja: 前に会ってる ちょっと待ってて

translation.en: Heard your daughter got arrested tonight. It's not a good look, Jeff.
translation.ja: 娘さんが逮捕なんて みっともないわ

translation.en: - My daughter? Oh, you're funny. -
translation.ja: “娘さん”？ 笑えるね 共同親権だから

translation.en: Yeah, we have joint custody,
translation.ja: 笑えるね 共同親権だから

translation.en: which means half of her attitude is your responsibility.
translation.ja: 不始末の半分は君の責任だ

translation.en: Jeff, Anissa has not been in our custody for quite some time now.
translation.ja: アニッサは親権を離れてる

translation.en: Now, I know it's hard for you to swallow, but she's not a child anymore.
translation.ja: 気持ちは分かるけど もう子供じゃない

translation.en: She's a grown woman.
translation.ja: 大人の女性よ

translation.en: Yeah, legally true, but emotionally and financially,
translation.ja: 法的にはな だが感情的にも金銭的にも まだ私を頼ってる

translation.en: she is still in my care and always in my wallet.
translation.ja: だが感情的にも金銭的にも まだ私を頼ってる

translation.en: You know, I'm actually kind of proud of her.
translation.ja: それでも自慢の娘

translation.en: She's a lot like you, Jeff.
translation.ja: あなたにそっくり

translation.en: Always wanting to help, always fighting for change.
translation.ja: 人助けが好きで 改革を求めてる

translation.en: You are beautiful.
translation.ja: きれいだ

translation.en: Don't do that.
translation.ja: やめて

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何を？

translation.en: You know what.
translation.ja: 分かるでしょ

translation.en: Besides, Ms. Fowdy's waiting on you.
translation.ja: ファウディ先生が お待ちよ

translation.en: You know, you actually look really good in this suit.
translation.ja: 実際のところ スーツがよく似合う

translation.en: Hey, it's me.
translation.ja: 私だ

translation.en: No, I thought you said Jennifer was home.
translation.ja: ジェニファーがいない

translation.en: Absolutely ridiculous!
translation.ja: 絶対にあり得ない

translation.en: No, you should know better.
translation.ja: しっかりしろ

translation.en: Yeah, I will talk to you later.
translation.ja: あとで話そう

translation.en: No, Afropunk over Coachella any day of the week.
translation.ja: コーチェラより アフロパンクよ

translation.en: - No way. - Are you serious?
translation.ja: ウソだ シザやソランジュたちが 出演するのに？

translation.en: SZA, Solange, Childish Gambino?
translation.ja: シザやソランジュたちが 出演するのに？ シザやソランジュたちが 出演するのに？ 〝今どこ？〞 シザやソランジュたちが 出演するのに？ シザやソランジュたちが 出演するのに？ 〝パパにバレた！〞

translation.en: All right, all right, I'll give you that one.
translation.ja: 〝パパにバレた！〞 〝パパにバレた！〞 俺の負けだ 俺の負けだ

translation.en: So, you one of them alternative black girls?
translation.ja: 新進の黒人女性か

translation.en: All right, I'll take it.
translation.ja: まあね　いいかも

translation.en: No, for real, how old are you?
translation.ja: ホントの年は？

translation.en: I'm serious, I'm 18.
translation.ja: マジで18歳よ

translation.en: What's good, bruh?
translation.ja: 調子は？

translation.en: What up?
translation.ja: 何だ

translation.en: Uh, I'm gonna run to the restroom while you talk to your friends. Excuse me.
translation.ja: トイレに行くから話してて 失礼

translation.en: - No. - I'm sorry?
translation.ja: 嫌だ 何て？

translation.en: Chill. Chill.
translation.ja: おい　落ち着け

translation.en: Well, well, well, well.
translation.ja: これはこれは

translation.en: Why do I gotta chase you down to have a conversation?
translation.ja: 話があるのに なぜ逃げる？

translation.en: You ain't got to chase me down, Lala.
translation.ja: ララ　逃げてねえよ

translation.en: I'm just hustling, just trying to make the money you say I owe you.
translation.ja: 貸しがあるって言うから

translation.en: Oh, look, the money I say you owe me?
translation.ja: “言うから”だと？

translation.en: Bruh, did the Freeland PD not steal 100 grand worth of product from you when you got popped?
translation.ja: お前は サツにパクられて 10万分のブツを奪われた

translation.en: See, none of this is my business. I'm gonna go. I'm just--
translation.ja: 関係ないから帰る

translation.en: I'm talking, sweetheart. Just stand there and be cute.
translation.ja: 話の途中だ おとなしくしてろ

translation.en: 'Cause I want to make sure that we clear on this point.
translation.ja: この際ハッキリさせよう

translation.en: Did you not have commissary money?
translation.ja: ムショでの小遣い

translation.en: Did you not have the best lawyer in Freeland?
translation.ja: 最高の弁護士もつけた

translation.en: The money I say you owe me?
translation.ja: それが貸しってやつだ

translation.en: - I'm talking to you, man. -
translation.ja: 何とか言えよ

translation.en: Why you got to do that in front of my girl?
translation.ja: 彼女の前でよせ

translation.en: You know I'm good for it. I'm gonna get you your money.
translation.ja: カネは返すさ

translation.en: Don't say that. I'm not his girl. I just met him tonight, I swear--
translation.ja: 彼女じゃない さっき会ったの

translation.en: Hey, shut up. As a matter of fact,
translation.ja: 黙れ 思ったんだが―

translation.en: I think your girl should start putting in some work
translation.ja: シーホース･モーテルで 女を働かせては？

translation.en: over at the Seahorse Motel to pay down some of that debt.
translation.ja: シーホース･モーテルで 女を働かせては？ 借金を返せる

translation.en: We good?
translation.ja: いいか？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, we're good.
translation.ja: ああ　それでいい

translation.en: We're good.  With your proper ass, man.
translation.ja: よし　あとは黙っとけ

translation.en: No! No! The hell, we're not good. I'm not ho- ing for nobody! - I don't even know this dude! - Jen, Jen, I'm sorry. Wait.
translation.ja: 売りなんてしないし こんなヤツ知らない

translation.en: You know what? I thought you were kind of cute until I found out you were somebody's bitch.
translation.ja: イケてると思ったのに パシリとは

translation.en: Hey, man, I like this girl, man.
translation.ja: この女 気に入ったぜ

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Where you think you going, Bojangles?
translation.ja: どこ行く気だ

translation.en: No, please, let's not do this. I just need to get through that door.
translation.ja: いいから入れてくれ

translation.en: You ain't getting up in here.
translation.ja: 無理だね

translation.en: I tried to do it the right way.
translation.ja: 仕方ないな

translation.en: Do you see him?
translation.ja: ヤツは？

translation.en: - Where'd he go? - Move! Move!
translation.ja: どこに？

translation.en: Right there!
translation.ja: いたぞ！

translation.en: Where'd he go?
translation.ja: どこ行った？

translation.en: Where you at?
translation.ja: どこだ？

translation.en: Come on! Come on! Hurry!
translation.ja: 急げ！

translation.en: You in the suit!
translation.ja: 止まれ

translation.en: Stay right where you are.
translation.ja: そこを動くな

translation.en: Put your hands where we can see 'em!
translation.ja: 両手を見えるように

translation.en: Do not move.
translation.ja: 動くな

translation.en: Get on the ground!
translation.ja: 伏せろ！

translation.en: He said, Get on the ground!
translation.ja: 伏せろと言ってる！

translation.en: You get your black ass on the ground.
translation.ja: その黒いケツを地面に

translation.en: You are lucky you didn't get shot or end up in some motel room right now, all drugged up and being passed around!
translation.ja: ラッキーよ　今頃 クスリ漬けで回されてたかも

translation.en: All right, you're going too far with it.
translation.ja: 大げさね

translation.en: No, I'm not. It's happening every day.
translation.ja: 毎日 起きてることだわ

translation.en: Plus, you lied to me. You said you were going to a small house party, not Club 100.
translation.ja: 家のパーティーって ウソついてクラブ100に

translation.en: Well, if I'd said Club 100, would you have still let me go?
translation.ja: 正直に言えば行かせた？

translation.en: - Uh, no. - Right.
translation.ja: ほら

translation.en: Because your fast ass shouldn't be going there anyway.
translation.ja: 行っちゃダメなの

translation.en: You know why they call it Club 100, Jennifer?
translation.ja: なぜ“100”か分かる？

translation.en: Because that's all who hang there. Gang members.
translation.ja: 100のたまり場だからよ

translation.en: Well, all you guys want me to do is go to school, run track,
translation.ja: ただ学校に通い 走り “お手本になれ”って

translation.en: and set a good example for the other girls.
translation.ja: ただ学校に通い 走り “お手本になれ”って それじゃいけない？

translation.en: When did that become a bad thing?
translation.ja: それじゃいけない？

translation.en: I'm not Dad! I'm not you, and I'm not the Queen of Garfield.
translation.ja: パパでも姉さんでも 女王でもない

translation.en: No, no, this is not about Dad or me or some silly name they call you at school.
translation.ja: パパも私も学校のあだ名も 関係ないわ

translation.en: It's about the fact that you're trying to act grown when clearly you're not.
translation.ja: 大人のふりをするなってこと

translation.en: Why are you being such a bitch right now?
translation.ja: なんてビッチなの

translation.en: Call me a bitch one more time.
translation.ja: ビッチはやめて

translation.en: I just won't tell you next time. How about that?
translation.ja: 今度は黙って行く

translation.en: You didn't tell me this time.
translation.ja: だましたでしょ

translation.en: You came up in this house shaking because you were so scared.
translation.ja: 帰った時は 震えて 怖がってたくせに

translation.en: That's what told me. Now you want to act all cool
translation.ja: 帰った時は 震えて 怖がってたくせに 今は大冒険だったと？

translation.en: like it was just, what, some great adventure?
translation.ja: 今は大冒険だったと？

translation.en: All right, I'm already stressed out. - I can't with you right now. - Okay.
translation.ja: もうクタクタ ひとりにして　携帯を

translation.en: - Give me my phone, please. - Okay, you're not getting your phone.
translation.ja: 没収よ

translation.en: Anissa.
translation.ja: アニッサ

translation.en: I'm not here to talk about Club 100.
translation.ja: クラブ100の件よりも

translation.en: We are here because two police officers were viciously attacked tonight
translation.ja: 問題は この街を守る 警官２名が 問題は この街を守る 警官２名が 〝クラブ１００で銃撃〞

translation.en: while on the job protecting and serving this community,
translation.ja: 問題は この街を守る 警官２名が 〝クラブ１００で銃撃〞 勤務中に襲われたことです

translation.en: plain and simple.
translation.ja: 勤務中に襲われたことです

translation.en: Witnesses say it looked a lot like Black Lightning was involved at the incident at Club 100.
translation.ja: ブラックライトニングが 関与してるとの証言も

translation.en: That's fake news...
translation.ja: デマだね

translation.en: This is not a game. This is real, Jen.
translation.ja: ゲームじゃない これが現実よ

translation.en: You all are really reaching, boy...
translation.ja: 飛躍しすぎだ

translation.en: We are looking for a regular, human, black male, who was probably hyped up on drugs.
translation.ja: 捜してるのは普通の人間の 黒人男性で ドラッグを使用

translation.en: This assailant is responsible for an attack on two of Freeland's finest officers, not some freak...
translation.ja: 警官２名を 襲ったものとみています

translation.en: - - I thought you were done being a hero.
translation.ja: ヒーローは辞めたと

translation.en: I am.
translation.ja: 辞めた

translation.en: Doesn't look like it.
translation.ja: そうは見えん

translation.en: Thanks for stitching me up.
translation.ja: 傷の手当てを？

translation.en: Luckily, it's just a flesh wound.
translation.ja: 幸い軽傷だった

translation.en: It doesn't feel like a flesh wound.
translation.ja: その割には痛む

translation.en: Nine years...
translation.ja: ９年か…

translation.en: It has been nine years since I've even come close to using my powers.
translation.ja: パワーを使おうとすら 思わなかった

translation.en: And each of those nine years I've told you this city needs you. So what's next?
translation.ja: その間 復活しろと 言い続けた　今後は？

translation.en: What? If you mean Black Lightning, there is no next.
translation.ja: ブラックライトニングに 今後はない

translation.en: No, my daughter is safe.
translation.ja: 娘は助けたし

translation.en: Do you remember why you became Black Lightning?
translation.ja: きっかけを覚えてるか？

translation.en: You wanted to give the people hope.
translation.ja: 人々に希望を与え―

translation.en: You wanted the evil that's out there to have something to fear.
translation.ja: 悪党を恐れさせるためだ

translation.en: Right now there's nothing to fear and evil's running rampant like a plague through this city,
translation.ja: 今じゃ連中は 街中にはびこってる

translation.en: hell, through this world.
translation.ja: いや 世界中にだ

translation.en: Okay. You know what?
translation.ja: 分かったよ

translation.en: Let's cut through the poetry and just talk real.
translation.ja: キレイごと抜きで 現実を話そう

translation.en: Now, the purpose of Black Lightning was to kill Tobias
translation.ja: 目的は トビアスを倒すことだった

translation.en: for literally shoving my father's articles down his throat until he died.
translation.ja: のどに記事を押し込み 親父を殺したヤツを

translation.en: Then it was because of crime bosses, crooked politicians,
translation.ja: そのうち ギャングのボスや 悪徳政治家

translation.en: every small- time street thug that had snatched a purse or robbed a store.
translation.ja: ケチな殺し屋 ひったくりや 強盗とも戦うハメに

translation.en: You see, there's no end, Gambi.
translation.ja: キリがないんだ

translation.en: There's no bottom for Black Lightning.
translation.ja: どこまでも落ちてく

translation.en: And the only loser in all of it is... me.
translation.ja: 唯一 割を食うのは… 私だ

translation.en: I feel like Lynn and I are making room for a possibility of a reconciliation.
translation.ja: リンとは やり直せそうな 雰囲気になってる

translation.en: Do you hear me? I have a shot at putting my family back together.
translation.ja: 家族一緒に暮らせる チャンスだ

translation.en: Black Lightning is not gonna jeopardize that.
translation.ja: ブラックライトニングに 邪魔させない

translation.en: I love Lynn and those girls,
translation.ja: 家族もいいが―

translation.en: but we knew this day would come.
translation.ja: この日が来た

translation.en: Jefferson, I've known you since you were 12 years old.
translation.ja: 12歳の時から知ってて 息子同然だから

translation.en: You're like my son, so I have to tell you the truth.
translation.ja: 12歳の時から知ってて 息子同然だから 真実を伝えよう

translation.en: The promise you made Lynn was well- intentioned,
translation.ja: リンとの約束にも―

translation.en: but it always had an expiration date.
translation.ja: 期限があるはずだ

translation.en: Jeff, baby...
translation.ja: ジェフ…

translation.en: I can't do this anymore, Jeff.
translation.ja: もう耐えられない

translation.en: I can't stay here with the girls and just watch you kill yourself.
translation.ja: あなたの自殺行為を 見るなんて

translation.en: I promise, no more.
translation.ja: 誓うよ もうやめる

translation.en: See, that's a curious question. Why is he a vigilante
translation.ja: なぜ彼は 〝自警主義者〞なのか 〝ブラックライトニング 復活か？〞

translation.en: but other communities have folks with superpowers, and all of a sudden, they're heroes?
translation.ja: よそでは 超人がヒーロー扱いなのに

translation.en: This shows you how, in this country of nearly 400 years... - Hey. - Hey. ...there's a double standard when it comes to us.
translation.ja: これは400年にも及ぶ ダブルスタンダードの表れだ

translation.en: You know, I was just thinking about you on the drive over here.
translation.ja: 君のことを考えてた

translation.en: What were you thinking?
translation.ja: どんなこと？

translation.en: Things you are not supposed to say - to your ex- wife. -
translation.ja: 元妻には言えないことさ

translation.en: Everything okay?
translation.ja: 変わりない？

translation.en: Yeah. I just came over to calm Jennifer down.
translation.ja: ジェニファーを慰めに

translation.en: She was pretty shaken up.
translation.ja: 動揺してた

translation.en: Why? What happened?
translation.ja: 何で？

translation.en: She was at Club 100 when that mess went down.
translation.ja: 銃撃の時 クラブ100に

translation.en: - She was there? - We tried calling you.
translation.ja: いたのか？ 電話したのよ　学校にも

translation.en: We even tried calling the school.
translation.ja: 電話したのよ　学校にも

translation.en: I think we've managed to calm ourselves down, but it was scary hearing it, though.
translation.ja: 何とか気を 落ち着かせたけどね

translation.en: Damn. The board had me hemmed up. I mean, they're trying to...
translation.ja: クソッ… 理事会に捕まってたよ

translation.en: It doesn't matter. It doesn't matter.
translation.ja: そんなの関係ないか

translation.en: I tell you, these girls... I mean, one of 'em gets arrested, the other's sneaking into clubs.
translation.ja: 娘の１人が逮捕され もう１人はクラブへ

translation.en: As scary and dangerous as it was, Jennifer was just being a teenager.
translation.ja: 危険だったけど ジェニファーは まだ10代

translation.en: Don't take it personal and don't start having catastrophic thoughts.
translation.ja: あまり深刻に受け止めないで

translation.en: - Yeah, well, it's hard not to. - I agree.
translation.ja: 難しいな 確かに

translation.en: When I think about what could have happened, it makes me sick to my stomach.
translation.ja: もしもを考えたら 胃が痛む

translation.en: Now she knows what can happen.
translation.ja: あの子も学習した

translation.en: - You're right. You're right. -
translation.ja: だな　仰せの通り

translation.en: Mmm, I better go.
translation.ja: 行かなきゃ

translation.en: Oh, and I played bad parent tonight. - You know, did the whole speech... - Mmm- hmm.
translation.ja: お説教は 私からしておいたわ

translation.en: You lied. You put yourself in danger.
translation.ja: ウソついて危険な目に…

translation.en: This speaks to your character. No social media for a month.
translation.ja: ウソついて危険な目に… ＳＮＳは １ヵ月禁止にしといた

translation.en: So you're good on that front.
translation.ja: ＳＮＳは １ヵ月禁止にしといた

translation.en: Wow. A month? You're not playing.
translation.ja: １ヵ月も キツいな

translation.en: No. No, I'm not. Not when it comes to keeping them alive.
translation.ja: そうよ 命に関わることだから

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: So, I was watching the news tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜 ニュースを見てたら

translation.en: And they were talking about Black Lightning.
translation.ja: ブラックライトニングの話が

translation.en: - What were they saying? - That he's back.
translation.ja: 何て？ 復活したと

translation.en: Is he?
translation.ja: そうなの？

translation.en: Lynn, of course not. You know better than that.
translation.ja: あり得ない 知ってるだろ

translation.en: I have saved more lives as a principal than I ever would have as Black Lightning.
translation.ja: 校長として より多くの命を 救ってきたんだ

translation.en: I'm not looking to go backwards.
translation.ja: 戻る気はない

translation.en: I pray that's true.
translation.ja: そう祈るわ

translation.en: It is.
translation.ja: 本気だ

translation.en: Good. 'Cause I don't ever wanna see you like that again. Ever.
translation.ja: よかった あの頃のあなたは 見たくない

translation.en: It was too painful.
translation.ja: つらすぎた

translation.en: You are talking like someone who cares about me.
translation.ja: その言い方はまるで 私が大切だと

translation.en: I do care about you, Jeff.
translation.ja: 大切に思ってる

translation.en: I do.
translation.ja: 本当よ

translation.en: You're not gonna find anything.
translation.ja: 何も見つからない

translation.en: Just a man who wants his woman back.
translation.ja: 君を取り戻したいだけ

translation.en: I should go.
translation.ja: 帰るわ

translation.en: - Drive safe. -
translation.ja: 気をつけて

translation.en: Daddy, why are you bleeding so much?
translation.ja: パパ　何で血だらけに？

translation.en: You may as well be some crackhead.
translation.ja: ヤク中の方がマシ

translation.en: I want you out. I want a divorce.
translation.ja: 出てって 離婚する

translation.en: You broke your promise.
translation.ja: 誓いを破った

translation.en: Look, you have this fervor, this desire for a savior,
translation.ja: 救世主を望む声が 高まってるのは

translation.en: and that speaks to how this system has utterly failed the black community.
translation.ja: 黒人社会が 不当に扱われてるからです

translation.en: Look, if Black Lightning is back, this is a game changer for Freeland.
translation.ja: ブラックライトニングが 変えてくれる

translation.en: Tobias! Please! Don't do this! Tobias!
translation.ja: トビアス　お願いだ やめてくれ！

translation.en: Hey, boss, you're gonna wanna come take a look at this.
translation.ja: ボス これ見てください

translation.en: Mr. Martin, is Black Lightning back?
translation.ja: マーティンさん 彼は復活を？

translation.en: Come on, what have you got?
translation.ja: 実際 どうなんです？

translation.en: You've got people praying for someone others call a vigilante to be back in this city,
translation.ja: 人々は自警主義者の復活を 望んでいますが

translation.en: even though we haven't confirmed if this rumor is true.
translation.ja: 噂の真相は定かじゃない

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.ja: 何する気だ？ やめとけ

translation.en: Stan, I have not heard from your parents.
translation.ja: スタン ご両親に電話させて

translation.en: - Have them call me. - Will do, sir.
translation.ja: 了解です

translation.en: So, that's what this is really all about, right?
translation.ja: 要は何だ？

translation.en: - The board thinks-- - No.
translation.ja: 理事会が…

translation.en: The board wanting to put metal detectors in the school.
translation.ja: 学校に金属探知機を

translation.en: It's not about the metal--
translation.ja: 重要なのは…

translation.en: Oh, Kay, I have the yearbook proofs in my office.
translation.ja: ケイ イヤーブックの写真が

translation.en: - Come find me. - All right. Jefferson, it's not about the metal detectors, it's about the safety of the students.
translation.ja: 探知機ではなく 生徒の安全です

translation.en: - The safety of the students? - Yes. Is that what they told you?
translation.ja: 彼らが“安全”と 言ったのか？

translation.en: No, look... Now, I will not treat my students like criminals.
translation.ja: いいか　生徒たちを 犯罪者扱いしたくない

translation.en: Do you realize almost all of these kids know someone in prison?
translation.ja: 皆 刑務所に 知り合いがいる

translation.en: Yeah, their mothers, or fathers, or their aunties, uncles.
translation.ja: 母親 父親 おばにおじ

translation.en: Now I will not turn my school into another jail, Kara.
translation.ja: 学校は 刑務所と同じにしない

translation.en: I'll relay the message.
translation.ja: お伝えします

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: よろしく

translation.en: You really don't quit, do you, old man?
translation.ja: 〝ギャンビ ヒーローも悪くない〞 〝ギャンビ ヒーローも悪くない〞 諦めが悪いな 諦めが悪いな

translation.en: When you're staring down the barrel of a gun,
translation.ja: 銃で脅されたら― 〝店主 救われる〞

translation.en: you don't care if the person saving you is a Christian, Muslim, Jew,
translation.ja: 誰彼構わず助けを求める 宗教も人種も関係ない

translation.en: black or white, or some guy in a weird Parliament- Funkadelic getup.
translation.ja: 宗教も人種も関係ない パーラメント･ ファンカデリックでも

translation.en: - Parliament? - You just wanna be saved.
translation.ja: 何だ？ 助けられたいんだ

translation.en: - Hurry up, man! - Here it is.
translation.ja: 早く！ ここだ

translation.en: I've watched this every year on my birthday since then.
translation.ja: 毎年 誕生日に見てる

translation.en: I wouldn't have seen my kids graduate college, the first black President,
translation.ja: 子供たちの大学卒業も 黒人初の大統領も

translation.en: or my grandkids if it wasn't for Black Lightning.
translation.ja: 孫も 彼のおかげで見られた

translation.en: What are you even doing here?
translation.ja: ここで何を？

translation.en: Jennifer, damn, girl, come on!
translation.ja: 冷たくするな　言ったろ

translation.en: I told you, I just wanna make sure we were cool.
translation.ja: 冷たくするな　言ったろ 仲直りしたい

translation.en: Look, I saw your Instagram and I zoomed in on your initials and you know, I found you.
translation.ja: インスタでイニシャル見て ここが分かった

translation.en: Okay, one, that's called stalking. And second, it's creepy.
translation.ja: それってストーカー キモいから消えてよ

translation.en: - Now get out of here, I'm serious. - No, it's not! Yo, Jen--
translation.ja: それってストーカー キモいから消えてよ やめて！

translation.en: Stop! What the hell is wrong with you? Get your hands off me!
translation.ja: 何なの　離して

translation.en: Damn! Why do black girls gotta have so much attitude?
translation.ja: クソッ！ 黒人女が偉そうに

translation.en: What the hell is wrong with you, grabbing on her like that?
translation.ja: この子に乱暴しないで

translation.en: You need to get up out my face.
translation.ja: 引っ込んでろ

translation.en: You are not a student here and I'm asking you to leave before I call the police.
translation.ja: ここの生徒じゃない 警察呼ぶ前に去って

translation.en: Bitch, I told you to get out of my face.
translation.ja: 引っ込めと言ったろ

translation.en: That's it. I'm calling the police.
translation.ja: じゃあ通報を

translation.en: The hell you not.
translation.ja: させるか！

translation.en: Now what happens after you pull this gun?
translation.ja: 銃をどうする？

translation.en: You going to shoot her? In front of the entire school?
translation.ja: 学校の前で 彼女を撃つのか？

translation.en: You're on parole, right?
translation.ja: 仮釈放中か　そうだな

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. There are cameras all over this place.
translation.ja: 仮釈放中か　そうだな 監視カメラだらけだ

translation.en: Do you really wanna go back to jail for a school shooting?
translation.ja: 学校で発砲して 刑務所へ？

translation.en: 'Cause that is life with no possibility of getting out.
translation.ja: 一生 出られないぞ

translation.en: You don't know who you're messing with.
translation.ja: 俺を知らないな

translation.en: You're right, I don't.
translation.ja: ああ　知らんが

translation.en: But the police are already on their way and they don't care who you are.
translation.ja: じき警察が来る お前が何者だろうと

translation.en: They will shoot your black ass for fun.
translation.ja: 喜んで撃ってくるぞ

translation.en: This ain't over. Bet that.
translation.ja: 終わりじゃねえ 覚えとけ

translation.en: What the hell were you thinking?
translation.ja: 何 考えてる？

translation.en: I mean, you not only put yourselves in danger, but also the entire school.
translation.ja: 自分だけじゃなく 学校までも危険に

translation.en: What was I supposed to do?
translation.ja: どうすれば？

translation.en: You were supposed to follow school protocol, call security, and walk away.
translation.ja: 学内規則では 警備員を呼び避難だ

translation.en: It's been seven years since I took over as principal.
translation.ja: 校長になって７年…

translation.en: Seven years, and we haven't had one incident of violence. Not one. And now this.
translation.ja: ７年間 暴力沙汰がなかった １度も 今日までは

translation.en: If you haven't noticed, Dad, violence is everywhere in Freeland.
translation.ja: 暴力は街中にあふれてるわ

translation.en: Did you really think it wasn't gonna touch Garfield at some point?
translation.ja: 学校だけは 安全だと思ってた？

translation.en: Either we help the community as a whole or we will all go down in pieces.
translation.ja: 街全体を救わなきゃ共倒れよ

translation.en: No. No, this is not about one of your political diatribes right now.
translation.ja: やめろ 政治討論する場じゃない

translation.en: It's not about the community. A community, I might remind you,
translation.ja: 街については お前が生まれる前から 戦ってきた

translation.en: I've been fighting for since before you were born.
translation.ja: お前が生まれる前から 戦ってきた

translation.en: This is about me trying to keep my daughters alive. Period.
translation.ja: 今は お前たちの命の話だ

translation.en: What happened, Dad?
translation.ja: 何があったの？

translation.en: When did you abandon your people?
translation.ja: いつ仲間を見捨てた？

translation.en: Love you. Anissa.
translation.ja: 愛してる

translation.en: Mr. Jefferson.
translation.ja: ジェファーソン先生

translation.en: Latavious.
translation.ja: ラタヴィアス

translation.en: Wow. Latavious.
translation.ja: ラタヴィアス…

translation.en: Nobody's called me that since I graduated from Garfield.
translation.ja: 卒業以来 そう呼ばれてない

translation.en: I'm kinda busy, so let's jump right in.
translation.ja: 忙しいので本題に

translation.en: I heard what happened with Will. Not cool, especially at the school.
translation.ja: ウィルの件は聞いた 学校で銃とは

translation.en: Yes, exactly. Now I've had an unwritten agreement for years with all the gangs.
translation.ja: よくない ギャングとは暗黙の了解が…

translation.en: Garfield is a safe zone, right? He broke that.
translation.ja: ガーフィールド高は 安全地帯だとな

translation.en: Now I'm trying not to drag the police into this because I do not want things to escalate.
translation.ja: 警察を巻き込んで 大ごとにしたくない

translation.en: But I need you to keep Will away from my girls,
translation.ja: 娘たちには ウィルを近づけるな

translation.en: and away from Garfield.
translation.ja: 学校にも

translation.en: Will's my cousin.
translation.ja: ウィルはいとこだ

translation.en: He's been kinda lost since he got out of jail.
translation.ja: 出所して迷ってる

translation.en: But you ain't trying to hear all that. I get it.
translation.ja: 聞きたくねえ話だろ

translation.en: Hey, come here.
translation.ja: 待てよ

translation.en: You late. The van's gone already.
translation.ja: 遅いぞ　バスが出ちまった

translation.en: This is Mr. Jefferson. I went to his school.
translation.ja: 恩師のジェファーソン先生だ

translation.en: Come on, man. You know that's not how we do.
translation.ja: マジかよ 教えただろ

translation.en: Look at Mr. Jefferson in the eyes. Shake his hand and introduce yourself.
translation.ja: 先生の目を見て 握手して自己紹介を

translation.en: Hey, Mr. Jefferson. My name's Malik. It's a pleasure to meet you.
translation.ja: マリクです どうぞよろしく

translation.en: It's a pleasure to meet you, too.
translation.ja: こちらこそ

translation.en: Whoo! That's what I'm talking about. Yeah. Everything okay?
translation.ja: それでいい 調子は？

translation.en: - Yeah, everything's cool. - Excellent.
translation.ja: バッチリさ よかった

translation.en: - - Latavious.
translation.ja: ラタヴィアス

translation.en: 'Cause I was told that you spent most of yesterday playing video games in your phone.
translation.ja: 昨日は一日中 携帯でゲームしてたと

translation.en: What pisses me off is when you don't give it your best, Malik.
translation.ja: 頑張らないヤツには ムカつく

translation.en: When you don't put in - the effort to succeed. - Ow.
translation.ja: 成功するには努力だ

translation.en: There's a time to play games and there's a time to focus on reality.
translation.ja: ゲームする時間に 現実を見てみろ

translation.en: And the reality of the situation is...
translation.ja: 現実ってのは…

translation.en: While you got your mind buried in them video games,
translation.ja: お前がゲームしてる間に

translation.en: them white boys up in them neighborhoods that you selling in
translation.ja: 商売相手の 白人のガキどもが

translation.en: are being prepared to run the world and your black ass!
translation.ja: 支配する準備をしてるんだ！

translation.en: Okay, Latavious, that is enough!
translation.ja: ラタヴィアス　十分だ！

translation.en: You know my damn name!
translation.ja: 俺の名前を！

translation.en: Now say it.
translation.ja: 言ってみろ

translation.en: Say it.
translation.ja: 言え

translation.en: Lala.
translation.ja: ララ…

translation.en: Never put your hands on me again.
translation.ja: 二度と手を出すな

translation.en: You teach them your way and I teach them mine.
translation.ja: 俺には俺の流儀がある

translation.en: Give me your phone.
translation.ja: 携帯を

translation.en: Go get that broom. I want these floors swept.
translation.ja: ほうきを取れ　床掃除だ

translation.en: And don't even ask me about your damn phone.
translation.ja: 携帯は忘れろ

translation.en: I'mma do you this favor.
translation.ja: 願いは聞いてやる

translation.en: But that means you owe me.
translation.ja: だが貸しだ

translation.en: We good?
translation.ja: いいな？

translation.en: We good.
translation.ja: よかろう

translation.en: That's a nice suit, man.
translation.ja: いいスーツだな

translation.en: Real nice suit.
translation.ja: 似合うぜ

translation.en: All right, ladies. Homework. Let me--
translation.ja: みんな　宿題を…

translation.en: Excuse me? I'm talking to you.
translation.ja: 何なの？ 答えなさい

translation.en: - Remember me? - I'm not afraid of The One Hundred.
translation.ja: 覚えてる？ 100なんて

translation.en: - Bitch, you should be! - Get your hands off of her!
translation.ja: ナメんな 離しなさい

translation.en: This could literally turn into a mess if we're not careful, Lynn.
translation.ja: 慎重にいかないと一大事に

translation.en: Now, let me at least confirm that they're at the Seahorse Motel before we go in.
translation.ja: 突入は ２人を確認してからだ

translation.en: How long does confirm take, Henderson?
translation.ja: いつ“確認”できるの？

translation.en: We're talking about our daughters here. Our daughters.
translation.ja: 娘たちが危険に 私たちのな

translation.en: I should just go over there and talk to someone my damn self.
translation.ja: 現場に行って話をつける

translation.en: Talk to who?
translation.ja: 話を？

translation.en: Who, Jeff?
translation.ja: 誰と？

translation.en: We're at this point right now 'cause you didn't talk to me in the first place.
translation.ja: 俺に相談しないからだぞ

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.ja: すまない

translation.en: It's not your fault.
translation.ja: お前は悪くない 大丈夫　何とかする

translation.en: Now, come on, man, let me take care of it. Let me do my job.
translation.ja: お前は悪くない 大丈夫　何とかする プロに任せろ

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: よろしく

translation.en: Jeff, where are you going?
translation.ja: ジェフ　どこへ？

translation.en: To get our girls.
translation.ja: 娘たちの所さ

translation.en: Bring them home.
translation.ja: 連れ戻して

translation.en: The One Hundred have Jennifer and Anissa.
translation.ja: 娘たちが100に

translation.en: Head downstairs.
translation.ja: 下に行け

translation.en: I've been working on something new.
translation.ja: 新しいのが

translation.en: Something better.
translation.ja: 改良版だ

translation.en: So your dumb ass thought that bringing them here was actually a good idea?
translation.ja: ラチればいいと 本気で思ったのか？

translation.en: These ain't no ordinary girls, man!
translation.ja: 普通の女じゃねえぞ

translation.en: Their father's like Black Jesus to Freeland!
translation.ja: 親父は黒いイエスだ！

translation.en: You know damn well
translation.ja: 分かるだろ

translation.en: that you don't make a move like this without permission.
translation.ja: 勝手にやっちゃマズい
俺はただ…

translation.en: See what I mean? It's been, like, what, huh,
translation.ja: 見てくれ 俺がここを仕切って―

translation.en: at least five years since I took over this place,
translation.ja: ５年は暴力なしで やってきたのに

translation.en: and we ain't had no violence here? Now look.
translation.ja: ５年は暴力なしで やってきたのに このザマだ

translation.en: Handle that.
translation.ja: 何とかしろ

translation.en: - Murk these girls and make them disappear. -
translation.ja: バラして死体を消せ

translation.en: And you do the same.
translation.ja: お前も消えろ

translation.en: Nice suit.
translation.ja: いいスーツだ

translation.en: Now you should at least give a brother a moment to say something heroically clever.
translation.ja: 兄貴にヒーローらしい セリフを言わせろ

translation.en: Now you've just pissed me off.
translation.ja: ムカっときた

translation.en: Let's go, Jen!
translation.ja: 逃げよう

translation.en: - Where is Lala? - I don't know!
translation.ja: ララはどこだ 知らない！

translation.en: Boy!
translation.ja: 小僧！

translation.en: Now, I'm only gonna ask you one more time.
translation.ja: もう一度だけ聞いてやる

translation.en: Where's Lala?
translation.ja: ララは？ 知らないってば

translation.en: I don't know, man!
translation.ja: 知らないってば

translation.en: Is that your car?
translation.ja: お前の車か？

translation.en: It was nice.
translation.ja: 惜しいな

translation.en: Get over here! Move! Move!
translation.ja: こっちだ　早く来い！

translation.en: They were holding us in that room up there. Right there!
translation.ja: 監禁されたの あの部屋よ

translation.en: - Hey, boss, you know, I-- -
translation.ja: ボス…

translation.en: Do you believe in the Resurrection, Latavious?
translation.ja: 復活を信じるか？

translation.en: - I asked you a question. -
translation.ja: 聞いてるんだ

translation.en: Do you believe in the Resurrection?
translation.ja: お前は復活を？ コンセプトは美しいが 空想に過ぎん

translation.en: The concept itself is beautiful, but it's a complete fantasy.
translation.ja: コンセプトは美しいが 空想に過ぎん

translation.en: I killed Black Lightning.
translation.ja: 殺したはずのヤツが

translation.en: - - But it seems you and whoever this is
translation.ja: 殺したはずのヤツが お前ともめてるのは 俺のビジネスの邪魔になる

translation.en: have developed an adversarial relationship that's bad for my business.
translation.ja: お前ともめてるのは 俺のビジネスの邪魔になる

translation.en: My question is, can you take care of this problem,
translation.ja: 聞くが お前は事態を収拾できるか？

translation.en: or should I just kill you now and solve it myself?
translation.ja: 今 お前を殺して 自分で始末すべきか？

translation.en: It's okay. It's okay, you're okay.
translation.ja: もう大丈夫　安心して

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: You're welcome.
translation.ja: いいんだ

translation.en: But it's not over yet.
translation.ja: だが まだ終わってない

translation.en: of The One Hundred!
translation.ja: 100なんて

translation.en: Bitch, you should be!
translation.ja: ナメんな…

translation.en: Murk these girls and make them disappear.
translation.ja: バラして死体を消せ

translation.en: It's that Black Lightning dude?
translation.ja: ブラックライトニングか

translation.en: Now you've just pissed me off!
translation.ja: ムカっときた

translation.en: These ain't no ordinary girls, man!
translation.ja: 普通の女じゃねえぞ
